text: Can I did it so many times last time like a few months ago. But now grabPay card is dirt shit. Spending in Malaysia would say best to use Amaze > Citi Rewards. Above that limit  perhaps Revolut or Trust Credit/ Debit card.

You may want to consider amaze>Citi for most spending  except for usual mcc exclusion for Citi cards.
